title: 321: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 4 (And We Finally Have the Real Villain…)
itunes:title: 321: Michelle’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 4 (And We Finally Have the Real Villain…)
description:
It’s recap time for The Broads! Bekah and Jess chat about Michelle’s latest episode and discuss STILL not understanding how Clayton is the Bachelor, reactions to Martin’s “hot tub” conversation, raging over the group date, Michelle’s continued vulnerability, Olu being the best, Chris’s presidential address, their predictions for Top 4, and much more!
